Uses of Package
de.lessvoid.nifty.node

  • Packages that use de.lessvoid.nifty.node 
    Package Description
    de.lessvoid.nifty
    Provides the public classes for Nifty representing the public Nifty API.
    de.lessvoid.nifty.node
    Standard NiftyNodes
  • Classes in de.lessvoid.nifty.node used by de.lessvoid.nifty 
    Class and Description

    Created by void on 09.08.15.
    NiftyReferenceNode

  • Classes in de.lessvoid.nifty.node used by de.lessvoid.nifty.node 
    Class and Description
    AbsoluteLayoutChildNode
    This is a child layout node for the AbsoluteLayoutNode.
    AbsoluteLayoutNode
    This is a layout node for a absolute value.
    AlignmentLayoutChildNode
    This is a child layout node for the AlignmentLayoutNode.
    AlignmentLayoutNode
    This is the parent node for a alignment layout.
    DockLayoutChildNode
    This is the child node for a dock layout that allows docking the node to a specific border of the parent node.
    DockLayoutNode
    This is the layout node for a docking layout.
    Horizontal
    Enumeration for the horizontal alignment.
    NiftyBackgroundFillNode
    The API for the NiftyBackgroundFillNode.
    NiftyContentNode
    Created by void on 09.08.15.
    NiftyReferenceNode
    Created by void on 12.09.15.
    NiftyTransformationNode
    The API for the NiftyTransformationNode node.
    Orientation
    Enums for horizontal and vertical orientation.
    PaddingLayoutNode
    The padding layout nodes applies a padding to the inner layout nodes.
    SimpleLayoutNode
    This type of layout node has the maximal size of any of it's children as size requirement and forwards the arrangement to all children in the same way.
    SizeLayoutNode
    This layout node allows to set a specific size that is applied to all child nodes.
    SizeLayoutNodeMode
    The possible values how the size of a SizeLayoutNode is handled.
    StackLayoutNode
    The layout node implementation for a stack layout.
    UniformStackLayoutNode
    The layout node implementation for a uniform stack layout.
    Vertical
    Enumeration for the vertical alignment.
